item.description:
Lets meet around 12:00 noon to for good seats and to get acquainted before the game starts at 1:00.
Cole's Tavern has a wide selection of beer, wine & spirits and delicious food made-to-order. The tavern features large HD screen plasma TVs and a friendly relaxing atmosphere.

http://www.colestaver...

$1.00 contribution to Organizer greatly is appreciated to help cover Meetup's monthly Web charges.


This event will also be combined with the The Metro West 30's to 40's Singles Meetup Group.
item.how_to_find_us: Meetup card on table, note there are 2 rooms - be sure to check both.
item.name: NE Patriots vs. Rams
